briefTitle: Open-label Extension Study of AbobotulinumtoxinA (Dysport速) for the Treatment of Cervical Dystonia
officialTitle: A Phase III, Prospective, Multicenter, Open-label Extension Study to Assess the Longer Term Safety and Efficacy of Repeated Treatment of Dysport速 Intramuscular Injection in the Treatment of Cervical Dystonia
summary: The aim of this study is to assess longer term safety and effectiveness of Dysport速.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Toronto Western Spasmodic Torticollis Rating Scale Total Score From Baseline
